perturbation.original_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.changed_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1997, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.explanation: Changing the effective date from 1998 to 1997 could create statute of limitations issues regarding the enforcement of the agreement. Depending on the specific cause of action and applicable state law, the statute of limitations could have expired, rendering the agreement unenforceable. This introduces a legal contradiction since a stale agreement might be presented as valid.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Statute of Limitations Laws (Vary by State and Federal Jurisdiction, e.g., Illinois, New York)

perturbation.original_text:
The text of Section 2. A. and B. of the Agreement is hereby
deleted in its entirety and the following language is inserted in its stead:
[***]
perturbation.changed_text:
The text of Section 2. A. and B. of the Agreement is hereby
deleted in its entirety and no language will be inserted in its stead:
perturbation.explanation: Deleting key sections of the original agreement (Section 2. A and B) and not replacing it with anything creates ambiguity and could render parts of the original agreement unenforceable. Contract law requires clearly defined terms, and removing these terms entirely can lead to legal disputes about the parties' obligations. This could lead to a breach of contract, which contradicts principles of contract law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles Regarding Essential Terms and Enforceability (e.g., Uniform Commercial Code)

perturbation.original_text:
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, the provision of the Original Agreement shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects, irrespective of the amendment's intentions.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the very purpose of the amendment. The original clause states that any conflicts should be resolved in favor of the SECOND AMENDMENT. The modified version states the Original Agreement prevails irrespective of the Amendment, thus rendering the entire amendment potentially useless, conflicting with intent to modify the original agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles Regarding Amendments and Intent of Parties
